```{r}
library(caret)
m <- 1e3
n <- 1e2
x <- matrix(rnorm(m*n),ncol=n,dimnames=list(seq_len(m),seq_len(n)))
y <- rnorm(m)
fit <- train(x, y, method="lm", trControl=trainControl(method="none"))
plot(y, predict(fit))
```
